description: {"blocks":[{"key":"frrjm","text":"This protocol describes the electropolymerization of chitosan nanobrushes in the working electrode of a Laser-induced graphene (LIG) sensor. The process requires approximately 36 minutes (including baseline analysis). The electropolymerization times are not included in this protocol. A 2-channel function / arbitrary waveform generator (SINGLENT SDG 1032X) was used throughout this protocol.
